00037 void WaveSquare :: init()
00038 {   
00039 
00040     pValid_.push_back(aw::pNameRate);
00041     pTypeMap_[aw::pNameRate] = aw::gTypeMono;
00042 
00043     pValid_.push_back(aw::pNameDutyCycle);
00044     pTypeMap_[aw::pNameDutyCycle] = aw::gTypeMono;
00045 
00046     pValid_.push_back(aw::pNameMinimum);
00047     pTypeMap_[aw::pNameMinimum] = aw::gTypeMono;
00048 
00049     pValid_.push_back(aw::pNameMaximum);
00050     pTypeMap_[aw::pNameMaximum] = aw::gTypeMono;
00051 
00052     // setup some default generators 
00053     Generator::setParameter(aw::pNameMinimum, 0,
00054                     aw::pContextNameNone);
00055     Generator::setParameter(aw::pNameMaximum, 1,
00056                     aw::pContextNameNone);
00057     Generator::setParameter(aw::pNameRate, 6,
00058                     aw::pContextNamePeriodSeconds);
00059     Generator::setParameter(aw::pNameDutyCycle, .3);
00060 
00061     reset();
00062 }

00080 // =============================================================================
00081 // set frequency
00082 
00083 // if our frequency is .5 hz, it means that our period is 2 seconds
00084 // if our frequency is 2 hz, it means tt our period is .5 second
00085 // if fq is 4 hz, period is .25 seconds
00086 // p == 1 / fq
00087 // fq == 1/ p
00088 
00089 
00090 
00091 
00092 // =============================================================================
00093 double WaveSquare :: getValueAtSample(aw::SampleTimeType st)
00094 {
00095     sampleTime_ = st;
00096     periodSamples_ = pMap_[aw::pNameRate]->getValueAtSample(st);
00097     sr_ = sys_->getSamplingRate();
00098 
00099 
00100     periodSamples_ = getValueWithContextToPeriodSamples(periodSamples_,
00101                      aw::pNameRate, sr_);
00102 
00103     // phase might be a parameter
00104     double phase = 0; // between 0 and 1
00105 
00106     // shift the desired time by the phase-scaled period
00107     if (phase != 0) {
00108         sampleTime_ += periodSamples_ * phase;
00109     };
00110 
00111     // find time position within the period 
00112     // if our period is 2, and our initial secondTime is 2.5, this
00113     // returns .5 
00114     sampleTime_ = fmod(sampleTime_, periodSamples_);
00115 
00116     if (sampleTime_ < periodSamples_ * 
00117             pMap_[aw::pNameDutyCycle]->getValueAtSample(st))
00118         amp_ = 0;
00119     else
00120         amp_ = 1;
00121 
00122     return aw::denorm(amp_, 
00123         pMap_[aw::pNameMinimum]->getValueAtSample(st),
00124         pMap_[aw::pNameMaximum]->getValueAtSample(st)
00125         );
00126 };
